H0.text: On this day, April 17th, in 1984, during an infamous incident in London, the murder of which person toolk place which has had long term political implications. WPC Fletcher's colleague

H1.text: On this day, April 17th, in 1984, during an infamous incident in London, the murder of which person toolk place which has had long term political implications. A British diplomat

H2.text: On this day, April 17th, in 1984, during an infamous incident in London, the murder of which person toolk place which has had long term political implications. A prominent politician

H3.text: On this day, April 17th, in 1984, during an infamous incident in London, the murder of which person toolk place which has had long term political implications. YVONNE FLETCHER

A4.text: The inquest into Fletcher's death reached the verdict that she was 'killed by a bullet coming from one of two windows on the west side of the front on the first floor of the Libyan People's Bureau'.

A5.text: A memorial was erected in St James's Square to commemorate Yvonne Fletcher, the first police officer honoured by the Police Memorial Trust.
